getAllMenus

java.util.List<Menu> getAllMenus(java.lang.Boolean system)
参数：
system - if system is true,get the system menus,which with @MenuMapping annotation, if system is false,get the customer menus,which created in the menus management if system is null,get all the menus
返回：
